casebody.data:
Gerald Lynn BOSTOCK, Petitioner
v.
CLAYTON COUNTY, GEORGIA No. 17-1618 Supreme Court of the United States. September 11, 2019

The joint motion of petitioner in No. 17-1618 and respondent in No. 17-1623 for divided argument is denied. The motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument is granted.
